altername_name: Zumba Kids: The Ultimate Zumba Dance Party
Zumba Kids: Die Ultimative Zumba Tanz-Party
name: Zumba Kids
overview: Jump in and have a blast with Zumba Kids, the ultimate dance-fitness party that gets families moving together with fun, high-energy rhythms across 20 different dance styles! -First video game based on the Zumba dance-fitness program designed specifically for Kids -Encourages self-confidence and fitness, and enhances coordination -Teaches you 20+ international dance styles across 30 easy-to-follow routines -Party with up to 4 players; Move to hit music from Justin Bieber, Willow Smith and more!
